metadata.description: "Reading & representing viewing listening writing speaking, adventure journey discovery"--Cover

[v. 1]. Units 1: introduction, looking ahead, units 2: heroism, choosing positive role models, units 3: media influences, shaping my viewpoint, print media -- [v. 2]. Units 4: media influences, shaping my viewpoint, electronic media, units 5: identity, establishing my values, looking within, units 6: identity, establishing my values, looking outward -- [v. 3]. Units 7: survival, testing my beliefs (novel), units 8: film study, extending my beliefs, units 9: environment, preserving my values (conclusion, personal portfolio presentation and review)
Approved for use in Alberta schools
